trans-unit.source: Provides methods for manipulating the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 提供用於操作剪貼簿的方法。

trans-unit.source: Items moved or copied to the Clipboard persist even after the application is shut down.
trans-unit.target: 移動或複製到剪貼簿項目會保存即使應用程式已關閉。

trans-unit.source: Data on the Clipboard can be in any data format, also called a Clipboard format.
trans-unit.target: 剪貼簿上的資料可以是任何資料格式，也稱為 剪貼簿格式。

trans-unit.source: For a list of predefined formats to use with the Clipboard, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats>.
trans-unit.target: 如需預先定義的格式，以便使用剪貼簿，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats>。

trans-unit.source: When an item is moved or copied to the Clipboard, items in other formats are cleared.
trans-unit.target: 當移動或複製到剪貼簿項目時，則會清除其他格式中的項目。

trans-unit.source: To make other formats persist, use <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.VariantType.DataObject>, which copies everything existing on the current Clipboard, including items pasted from other applications.
trans-unit.target: 若要進行保存其他格式，請使用<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.VariantType.DataObject>，也就是複製所有目前的剪貼簿，包括從其他應用程式貼上的項目上的現有項目。

trans-unit.source: Place data on the Clipboard in multiple formats to maximize the possibility that a target application, whose format requirements you might not know, can successfully retrieve the data.
trans-unit.target: 將資料放在剪貼簿以多種格式目標應用程式，您可能不知道其格式需求可以成功地擷取資料的可能性。

trans-unit.source: Because all Windows applications share the system Clipboard, the contents may change when you switch to another application.
trans-unit.target: 因為所有的 Windows 應用程式共用系統剪貼簿，當您切換到另一個應用程式時，就可能會變更內容。

trans-unit.source: A class must be serializable for it to be put on the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 類別必須是可序列化，才能放在剪貼簿。
請參閱[序列化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f7570c09-7db5-44f2-983a-e8859caeb0d5)如需詳細資訊。

trans-unit.source: When accessing the Clipboard remotely, a <xref:System.Threading.ThreadStateException> is thrown unless the accessing thread operates in STA (single-threaded apartment) mode.
trans-unit.target: 遠端存取剪貼簿時<xref:System.Threading.ThreadStateException>除非存取執行緒在 STA (單一執行緒 apartment) 模式下運作，否則會擲回。

trans-unit.source: To resolve this issue, set the `ThreadApartmentState` to `STA`.
trans-unit.target: 若要解決此問題，請設定`ThreadApartmentState`至`STA`。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Storing Data to and Reading from the Clipboard](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/storing-data-to-and-reading-from-the-clipboard.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從剪貼簿的讀取和儲存資料](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/storing-data-to-and-reading-from-the-clipboard.md)。

trans-unit.source: This example reads text from the Clipboard into the string `textOnClipboard`.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例會從剪貼簿文字插入字串`textOnClipboard`。

trans-unit.source: This example will fail if there is no text on the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有文字到剪貼簿上，此範例中將會失敗。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermission> class controls access to the Clipboard, and the associated <xref:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionClipboard> enumeration value indicates the level of access.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermission>類別控制存取剪貼簿，以及相關聯<xref:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionClipboard>列舉值表示的存取層級。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Additional Security Considerations in Windows Forms](~/docs/framework/winforms/additional-security-considerations-in-windows-forms.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[Windows Form 中的其他安全性考量](~/docs/framework/winforms/additional-security-considerations-in-windows-forms.md)。
這個範例會清除剪貼簿。

trans-unit.source: This removes all data from the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 這會移除所有資料從剪貼簿。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionClipboard.AllClipboard" /> permission is required to access the system Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionClipboard.AllClipboard" /> 權限，才能存取系統剪貼簿。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the Clipboard contains audio data.
trans-unit.target: 指出剪貼簿是否包含音效資料。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="True" /> if audio data is stored on the Clipboard; otherwise <see langword="False" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果剪貼簿上儲存了音訊資料，則為 <see langword="True" />，否則為 <see langword="False" />。

trans-unit.source: This example determines whether the Clipboard contains audio data and displays the result.
trans-unit.target: 此範例會判斷是否包含音訊資料剪貼簿，並顯示結果。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionClipboard.AllClipboard" /> permission is required to access the system Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionClipboard.AllClipboard" /> 權限，才能存取系統剪貼簿。

trans-unit.source: Name of the custom format to be checked.
trans-unit.target: 要檢查的自訂格式名稱。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the Clipboard contains data in the specified custom format.
trans-unit.target: 指出 [剪貼簿] 是否包含指定自訂格式的資料。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="True" /> if data in the specified custom format is stored on the Clipboard; otherwise <see langword="False" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 [剪貼簿] 上儲存了指定自訂格式的資料，則為 <see langword="True" />，否則為 <see langword="False" />。

trans-unit.source: If you have placed custom formatted data on the Clipboard, this method allows you to check the Clipboard for data in that format.
trans-unit.target: 如果您有自訂的格式化的資料放置在剪貼簿時，這個方法可讓您檢查剪貼簿，該格式的資料。

trans-unit.source: This example checks for data in the custom format `specialFormat`.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例會檢查自訂格式的資料`specialFormat`。

trans-unit.source: Replace `specialFormat` with the name of the custom format you wish to check.
trans-unit.target: 取代`specialFormat`您想要檢查的自訂格式的名稱。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionClipboard.AllClipboard" /> permission is required to access the system Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionClipboard.AllClipboard" /> 權限，才能存取系統剪貼簿。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see langword="Boolean" /> indicating whether the Clipboard contains a file drop list.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see langword="Boolean" />，指出 [剪貼簿] 是否包含檔案下拉清單。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="True" /> if a file drop list is stored on the Clipboard; otherwise <see langword="False" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果檔案下拉清單儲存在剪貼簿，則為 <see langword="True" />，否則為 <see langword="False" />。

trans-unit.source: A file drop list is a collection of strings containing path information for files.
trans-unit.target: 檔案的下拉式清單是包含檔案的路徑資訊的字串集合。

trans-unit.source: This example determines if there is a file drop list on the Clipboard and adds the list to the `ListBox.lstFiles` if they exist.
trans-unit.target: 此範例會判斷是否有檔案下拉清單到剪貼簿上，並將清單`ListBox.lstFiles`如果有的話。

trans-unit.source: This code will create an exception if there is no `ListBox` named `lstFiles`.
trans-unit.target: 此程式碼會建立例外狀況，如果沒有任何`ListBox`名為`lstFiles`。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionClipboard.AllClipboard" /> permission is required to access the system Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionClipboard.AllClipboard" /> 權限，才能存取系統剪貼簿。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see langword="Boolean" /> indicating whether an image is stored on the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see langword="Boolean" />，指出 [剪貼簿] 上是否儲存了一個影像。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="True" /> if an image is stored on the Clipboard; otherwise <see langword="False" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 [剪貼簿] 上儲存了影像，則為 <see langword="True" />，否則為 <see langword="False" />。

trans-unit.source: This example checks to see if there is an image on the Clipboard and, if so, gets the image and adds it to `PictureBox1`.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例會檢查是否在剪貼簿上沒有映像，如果是這樣、 取得映像並將它加入`PictureBox1`。

trans-unit.source: This example depends on the existence of a `PictureBox` named `PictureBox1`.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例會取決於是否存在`PictureBox`名為`PictureBox1`。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionClipboard.AllClipboard" /> permission is required to access the system Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionClipboard.AllClipboard" /> 權限，才能存取系統剪貼簿。

trans-unit.source: Determines if there is text on the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 判斷 [剪貼簿] 中是否有文字。

trans-unit.source: Determines if there is text on the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 判斷 [剪貼簿] 中是否有文字。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="True" /> if the Clipboard contains text; otherwise <see langword="False" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 [剪貼簿] 包含文字則為 <see langword="True" />，否則為 <see langword="False" />。

trans-unit.source: This example determines if HTML text is stored on the Clipboard and reads from the Clipboard if it does.
trans-unit.target: 此範例會判斷是否是這樣，是否要 HTML 文字儲存在剪貼簿，然後從剪貼簿的讀取。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionClipboard.AllClipboard" /> permission is required to access the system Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionClipboard.AllClipboard" /> 權限，才能存取系統剪貼簿。

trans-unit.source: If specified, identifies what text format to be checked for.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定，則會識別所應擷取的文字格式。

trans-unit.source: Determines if there is text on the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 判斷 [剪貼簿] 中是否有文字。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="True" /> if the Clipboard contains text; otherwise <see langword="False" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 [剪貼簿] 包含文字則為 <see langword="True" />，否則為 <see langword="False" />。

trans-unit.source: This example determines if HTML text is stored on the Clipboard and reads from the Clipboard if it does.
trans-unit.target: 此範例會判斷是否是這樣，是否要 HTML 文字儲存在剪貼簿，然後從剪貼簿的讀取。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionClipboard.AllClipboard" /> permission is required to access the system Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionClipboard.AllClipboard" /> 權限，才能存取系統剪貼簿。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves an audio stream from the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 從剪貼簿擷取音效串流。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> object containing audio data or <see langword="Nothing" /> if the Clipboard does not contain any audio data.
trans-unit.target: 包含音訊資料的 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> 物件，如果 [剪貼簿] 不包含任何音訊資料則為 <see langword="Nothing" />。

trans-unit.source: This example retrieves an audio stream from the Clipboard and plays it.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例會從剪貼簿中擷取音訊串流，並在播放。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionClipboard.AllClipboard" /> permission is required to access the system Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionClipboard.AllClipboard" /> 權限，才能存取系統剪貼簿。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves data in a custom format from the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 從 [剪貼簿] 擷取自訂格式的資料。

trans-unit.source: An <see langword="Object" /> representing the Clipboard data or <see langword="Nothing" /> if the Clipboard does not contain any data that is in the specified format or can be converted to that format.
trans-unit.target: 表示 [剪貼簿] 資料的 <see langword="Object" />，如果 [剪貼簿] 不包含任何指定格式或可以轉換為該格式的資料，則為 <see langword="Nothing" />。

trans-unit.source: This example reads data in the format `specialformat` from the Clipboard and writes it to file.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例會讀取資料格式`specialformat`從剪貼簿，並將寫入至檔案。

trans-unit.source: Replace `specialformat` with the custom data format you wish to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: 取代`specialformat`您想要擷取與自訂資料格式。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionClipboard.AllClipboard" /> permission is required to access the system Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionClipboard.AllClipboard" /> 權限，才能存取系統剪貼簿。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves data from the Clipboard as an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject" />.
trans-unit.target: 以 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject" /> 的形式從 [剪貼簿] 擷取資料。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject" /> object that represents the data currently on the Clipboard, or <see langword="Nothing" /> if there is no data on the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject" /> 物件，表示目前在 [剪貼簿] 中的資料，如果 [剪貼簿] 中沒有資料則為 <see langword="Nothing" />。

trans-unit.source: This is an advanced member; it does not show in IntelliSense unless you click the **All** tab.
trans-unit.target: 這是進階的成員;它不會顯示在 IntelliSense 中除非您按一下**所有** 索引標籤。

trans-unit.source: This example reads data from the Clipboard in the form of an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject> and then writes it to a file.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例會從剪貼簿中的形式，讀取資料<xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject>並再將它寫入至檔案。

trans-unit.source: Replace `C:\mylogfile` with the name of the file to which you want to write.
trans-unit.target: 取代`C:\mylogfile`具有您要寫入的檔案名稱。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionClipboard.AllClipboard" /> permission is required to access the system Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionClipboard.AllClipboard" /> 權限，才能存取系統剪貼簿。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a collection of strings representing file names from the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 從 [剪貼簿] 擷取表示檔名的字串集合。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.StringCollection" /> containing file names or <see langword="Nothing" /> if the Clipboard does not contain any data that is in the <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.FileDrop" /> format or can be converted to that format.
trans-unit.target: 如果剪貼簿不包含任何 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.StringCollection" /> 格式或可以轉換為該格式的資料，則為包含檔案名稱或 <see langword="Nothing" /> 的 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.FileDrop" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is available only for non-server applications.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是僅適用於非伺服器應用程式。

trans-unit.source: A file drop list is a collection of strings containing path information for files.
trans-unit.target: 檔案的下拉式清單是包含檔案的路徑資訊的字串集合。

trans-unit.source: This example determines if there is a file drop list on the Clipboard and adds the list to the `ListBox.lstFiles` if they exist.
trans-unit.target: 此範例會判斷是否有檔案下拉清單到剪貼簿上，並將清單`ListBox.lstFiles`如果有的話。

trans-unit.source: This code creates an exception if there is no `ListBox` named `lstFiles`.
trans-unit.target: 此程式碼建立的例外狀況，如果沒有任何`ListBox`名為`lstFiles`。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionClipboard.AllClipboard" /> permission is required to access the system Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionClipboard.AllClipboard" /> 權限，才能存取系統剪貼簿。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves an image from the Clipboard.

An <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> representing the Clipboard image data or <see langword="Nothing" /> if the Clipboard does not contain any data that is in the <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Bitmap" /> format or can be converted to that format.
trans-unit.target: 如果剪貼簿不包含任何 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> 格式或可以轉換為該格式的資料，則為代表剪貼簿影像資料或 <see langword="Nothing" /> 的 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Bitmap" />。

trans-unit.source: This example checks to see if there is an image on the Clipboard before retrieving it and assigning it to `PictureBox1`.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例會先確認剪貼簿上是否有影像，再擷取它，並將它指派給 `PictureBox1`。

trans-unit.source: For this example to function correctly, there must be a `PictureBox` named `PictureBox1` on your form.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例才能正確運作，必須要有`PictureBox`名為`PictureBox1`表單上。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionClipboard.AllClipboard" /> permission is required to access the system Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionClipboard.AllClipboard" /> 權限，才能存取系統剪貼簿。
從 [剪貼簿] 擷取文字。
從 [剪貼簿] 擷取文字。

trans-unit.source: The Clipboard text data or an empty string if the Clipboard does not contain data in the <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Text" /> or <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.TextDataFormat.UnicodeText" /> format, depending on the operating system.
trans-unit.target: [剪貼簿] 文字資料，如果 [剪貼簿] 不包含 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Text" /> 或 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.TextDataFormat.UnicodeText" /> 格式的文字資料 (依作業系統而定)，則為空字串。

trans-unit.source: This example reads text from the Clipboard into the string `textOnClipboard`.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例會從剪貼簿文字插入字串`textOnClipboard`。

trans-unit.source: This example fails if there is no text on the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 如果在剪貼簿上沒有任何文字，此範例中將會失敗。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionClipboard.AllClipboard" /> permission is required to access the system Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionClipboard.AllClipboard" /> 權限，才能存取系統剪貼簿。

trans-unit.source: If specified, identifies what text format should be retrieved.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定，則會識別所應擷取的文字格式。
從 [剪貼簿] 擷取文字。

trans-unit.source: The Clipboard text data or an empty string if the Clipboard does not contain data in the specified format.
trans-unit.target: [剪貼簿] 文字資料，如果 [剪貼簿] 不包含所指定格式的資料，則為空字串。

trans-unit.source: This example reads text from the Clipboard into the string `textOnClipboard`.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例會從剪貼簿文字插入字串`textOnClipboard`。

trans-unit.source: This example fails if there is no text on the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 如果在剪貼簿上沒有任何文字，此範例中將會失敗。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionClipboard.AllClipboard" /> permission is required to access the system Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionClipboard.AllClipboard" /> 權限，才能存取系統剪貼簿。

trans-unit.source: Writes audio data to the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 將音訊資料寫入至 [剪貼簿]。

trans-unit.source: Audio data to be written to the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 要寫入 [剪貼簿] 的音訊資料。

trans-unit.source: Writes audio data to the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 將音訊資料寫入至 [剪貼簿]。

trans-unit.source: Because the Clipboard can be accessed by other users, do not use it to store sensitive information, such as passwords or confidential data.
trans-unit.target: 因為其他使用者可以存取剪貼簿，所以請不要使用它來儲存機密資訊，例如密碼或機密資料。

trans-unit.source: This example creates the byte array `musicReader`, reads the file `cool.wav` into it, and then writes it to the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例會建立位元組陣列 `musicReader`，並在其中讀入檔案 `cool.wav`，然後將其寫入至剪貼簿。

trans-unit.source: Replace `cool.wav` with the name and path of the file you wish to read.
trans-unit.target: 取代`cool.wav`與您想要讀取的檔案路徑與名稱。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionClipboard.AllClipboard" /> permission is required to access the system Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionClipboard.AllClipboard" /> 權限，才能存取系統剪貼簿。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> Audio data to be written to the clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 要寫入剪貼簿的 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> 音訊資料。

trans-unit.source: Writes audio data to the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 將音訊資料寫入至 [剪貼簿]。

trans-unit.source: Because the Clipboard can be accessed by other users, do not use it to store sensitive information, such as passwords or confidential data.
trans-unit.target: 因為其他使用者可以存取剪貼簿，所以請不要使用它來儲存機密資訊，例如密碼或機密資料。

trans-unit.source: This example creates the byte array `musicReader`, reads the file `cool.wav` into it, and then writes it to the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例會建立位元組陣列 `musicReader`，並在其中讀入檔案 `cool.wav`，然後將其寫入至剪貼簿。

trans-unit.source: Replace `cool.wav` with the name and path of the file you wish to read.
trans-unit.target: 取代`cool.wav`與您想要讀取的檔案路徑與名稱。

trans-unit.source: Data object to be written to the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 要寫入 [剪貼簿] 的資料物件。

trans-unit.source: Writes data in a custom format to the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 將自訂格式的資料寫入 [剪貼簿]。

trans-unit.source: Because the Clipboard can be accessed by other users, do not use it to store sensitive information, such as passwords or confidential data.
trans-unit.target: 因為其他使用者可以存取剪貼簿，所以請不要使用它來儲存機密資訊，例如密碼或機密資料。

trans-unit.source: This example writes the `DataObject.dataChunk` to the Clipboard in the custom format `specialFormat`.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例會以自訂格式 `specialFormat`，將 `DataObject.dataChunk` 寫入至剪貼簿。

trans-unit.source: This example depends on the existence of the custom data format `specialFormat`.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例相依於自訂的資料格式的存在`specialFormat`。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionClipboard.AllClipboard" /> permission is required to access the system Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionClipboard.AllClipboard" /> 權限，才能存取系統剪貼簿。

trans-unit.source: Data object to be written to the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 要寫入 [剪貼簿] 的資料物件。

trans-unit.source: Writes a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject" /> to the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject" /> 寫入 [剪貼簿]。

trans-unit.source: This is an advanced member; it does not show in IntelliSense unless you click the **All** tab.
trans-unit.target: 這是進階的成員;它不會顯示在 IntelliSense 中除非您按一下**所有** 索引標籤。

trans-unit.source: Because the Clipboard can be accessed by other users, do not use it to store sensitive information, such as passwords or confidential data.
trans-unit.target: 因為其他使用者可以存取剪貼簿，所以請不要使用它來儲存機密資訊，例如密碼或機密資料。

trans-unit.source: This example writes the data object `dataChunk` to the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 此範例撰寫的資料物件`dataChunk`到剪貼簿。

trans-unit.source: This example depends on the existence of the data object `dataChunk`.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例相依於資料物件的存在`dataChunk`。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionClipboard.AllClipboard" /> permission is required to access the system Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionClipboard.AllClipboard" /> 權限，才能存取系統剪貼簿。

trans-unit.source: Writes a collection of strings representing file paths to the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 將表示檔案路徑的字串集合寫入 [剪貼簿]。

trans-unit.source: A file drop list is a collection of strings representing file names.
trans-unit.target: 檔案的下拉式清單是表示檔案名稱的字串集合。

trans-unit.source: Because the Clipboard can be accessed by other users, do not use it to store sensitive information, such as passwords or confidential data.
trans-unit.target: 因為其他使用者可以存取剪貼簿，所以請不要使用它來儲存機密資訊，例如密碼或機密資料。

trans-unit.source: This example gets the collection of file names from **MyDocuments**, converts it to a file drop list, and writes it to the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例會取得檔案名稱，從集合**MyDocuments**、 將它轉換成檔案的下拉式清單中，並將它寫入到剪貼簿。

trans-unit.source: Writes an image to the Clipboard.
Because the Clipboard can be accessed by other users, do not use it to store sensitive information, such as passwords or confidential data.
trans-unit.target: 因為其他使用者可以存取剪貼簿，所以請不要使用它來儲存機密資訊，例如密碼或機密資料。

trans-unit.source: This example writes the image `coolPicture` to the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 此範例寫入的映像`coolPicture`到剪貼簿。

trans-unit.source: This example depends on the existence of the image `coolPicture`.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例相依於映像存在`coolPicture`。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionClipboard.AllClipboard" /> permission is required to access the system Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionClipboard.AllClipboard" /> 權限，才能存取系統剪貼簿。

trans-unit.source: Previous Clipboard formats are not preserved.
trans-unit.target: 不會保留之前的剪貼簿格式。

trans-unit.source: Because the Clipboard can be accessed by other users, do not use it to store sensitive information, such as passwords or confidential data.
trans-unit.target: 因為其他使用者可以存取剪貼簿，所以請不要使用它來儲存機密資訊，例如密碼或機密資料。

trans-unit.source: This example writes the string `This is a test string.` to the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例會將字串寫入`This is a test string.`到剪貼簿。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionClipboard.AllClipboard" /> permission is required to access the system Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionClipboard.AllClipboard" /> 權限，才能存取系統剪貼簿。

trans-unit.source: Format to be used when writing text.
trans-unit.target: 寫入文字時所要使用的格式。

trans-unit.source: Previous Clipboard formats are not preserved.
trans-unit.target: 不會保留之前的剪貼簿格式。

trans-unit.source: Because the Clipboard can be accessed by other users, do not use it to store sensitive information, such as passwords or confidential data.
trans-unit.target: 因為其他使用者可以存取剪貼簿，所以請不要使用它來儲存機密資訊，例如密碼或機密資料。

trans-unit.source: This example writes the string `This is a test string.` to the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例會將字串寫入`This is a test string.`到剪貼簿。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionClipboard.AllClipboard" /> permission is required to access the system Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionClipboard.AllClipboard" /> 權限，才能存取系統剪貼簿。
